Title: Authorizes the creation of a 9-8-8 license plate
Summary: Authorizes the creation of a 9-8-8 license plate in support of the 9-8-8 suicide prevention and mental health crisis hotline system.
LawCode: Add ยง404-ff, V & T L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the vehicle and traffic law, in relation to authorizing the creation of a 9-8-8 license plate
